source:
---
title: Dataset 151 - Header
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    number-sections: true
engine: julia
execute:
  freeze: auto
  cache: true

#| echo: false
#| output: false
using UniversalFileFormat

data.text/plain:
Universal Dataset Number: 151

  [1mName: Header[22m

  [36mRecord 1: FORMAT(80A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- model file name[39m
  
  [36mRecord 2: FORMAT(80A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- model file description[39m
  
  [36mRecord 3: FORMAT(80A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- program which created DB[39m
  
  [36mRecord 4: FORMAT(10A1,10A1,3I10)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- date database created (DD-MMM-YY)[39m
  [36m            Field 2      -- time database created (HH:MM:SS)[39m
  [36m            Field 3      -- Version from database[39m
  [36m            Field 4      -- Version from database[39m
  [36m            Field 5      -- File type[39m
  [36m                            =0  Universal[39m
  [36m                            =1  Archive[39m
  [36m                            =2  Other[39m
  
  [36mRecord 5: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- date database last saved (DD-MMM-YY)[39m
  [36m            Field 2      -- time database last saved (HH:MM:SS)[39m
  
  [36mRecord 6: FORMAT(80A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- program which created universal file[39m
  
  [36mRecord 7: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)[39m
  [36m            Field 1      -- date universal file written (DD-MMM-YY)[39m
  [36m            Field 2      -- time universal file written (HH:MM:SS)[39m
data.text/markdown:
Universal Dataset Number: 151

**Name:   Header**

```julia
Record 1: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file name

Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file description

Record 3: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created DB

Record 4: FORMAT(10A1,10A1,3I10)
            Field 1      -- date database created (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database created (HH:MM:SS)
            Field 3      -- Version from database
            Field 4      -- Version from database
            Field 5      -- File type
                            =0  Universal
                            =1  Archive
                            =2  Other

Record 5: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date database last saved (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database last saved (HH:MM:SS)

Record 6: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created universal file

Record 7: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date universal file written (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time universal file written (HH:MM:SS)
```
data.text/html:
Universal Dataset Number: 151

Name: Header

Record 1: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file name

Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file description

Record 3: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created DB

Record 4: FORMAT(10A1,10A1,3I10)
            Field 1      -- date database created (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database created (HH:MM:SS)
            Field 3      -- Version from database
            Field 4      -- Version from database
            Field 5      -- File type
                            =0  Universal
                            =1  Archive
                            =2  Other

Record 5: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date database last saved (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database last saved (HH:MM:SS)

Record 6: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created universal file

Record 7: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date universal file written (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time universal file written (HH:MM:SS)
data.text/latex:
Universal Dataset Number: 151

\textbf{Name:   Header}

\begin{verbatim}
Record 1: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file name

Record 2: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- model file description

Record 3: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created DB

Record 4: FORMAT(10A1,10A1,3I10)
            Field 1      -- date database created (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database created (HH:MM:SS)
            Field 3      -- Version from database
            Field 4      -- Version from database
            Field 5      -- File type
                            =0  Universal
                            =1  Archive
                            =2  Other

Record 5: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date database last saved (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time database last saved (HH:MM:SS)

Record 6: FORMAT(80A1)
            Field 1      -- program which created universal file

Record 7: FORMAT(10A1,10A1)
            Field 1      -- date universal file written (DD-MMM-YY)
            Field 2      -- time universal file written (HH:MM:SS)
\end{verbatim}

data.text/plain:
[36mDataset151[39m

  A struct containing UFF Dataset 151 metadata.

  [1mFields[22m

    [34m• [39m [36mtype::Symbol[39m: Data set type
    [34m• [39m [36mmodel_name::String[39m: model file name
    [34m• [39m [36mdescription::String[39m: model file description
    [34m• [39m [36mapplication::String[39m: Program which created the dataset
    [34m• [39m [36mdatetime_created::DateTime[39m: dataset creation date and time
    [34m• [39m [36mversion::String[39m: version from dataset
    [34m• [39m [36mfile_type::Int[39m: file type
    [34m• [39m [36mdatetime_last_saved::DateTime[39m: dataset last saved date and time
    [34m• [39m [36mprogram::String[39m: program which created uff file
    [34m• [39m [36mdatetime_written::DateTime[39m: uff file written date and time
data.text/markdown:
```julia
Dataset151
```

A struct containing UFF Dataset 151 metadata.

**Fields**

  * `type::Symbol`: Data set type
  * `model_name::String`: model file name
  * `description::String`: model file description
  * `application::String`: Program which created the dataset
  * `datetime_created::DateTime`: dataset creation date and time
  * `version::String`: version from dataset
  * `file_type::Int`: file type
  * `datetime_last_saved::DateTime`: dataset last saved date and time
  * `program::String`: program which created uff file
  * `datetime_written::DateTime`: uff file written date and time
data.text/html:
Dataset151

A struct containing UFF Dataset 151 metadata.

Fields

  • type::Symbol: Data set type

  • model_name::String: model file name

  • description::String: model file description

  • application::String: Program which created the dataset

  • datetime_created::DateTime: dataset creation date and time

  • version::String: version from dataset

  • file_type::Int: file type

  • datetime_last_saved::DateTime: dataset last saved date and time

  • program::String: program which created uff file

  • datetime_written::DateTime: uff file written date and time
data.text/latex:
\begin{verbatim}
Dataset151
\end{verbatim}
A struct containing UFF Dataset 151 metadata.

\textbf{Fields}

\begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{type::Symbol}: Data set type


\item \texttt{model\_name::String}: model file name


\item \texttt{description::String}: model file description


\item \texttt{application::String}: Program which created the dataset


\item \texttt{datetime\_created::DateTime}: dataset creation date and time


\item \texttt{version::String}: version from dataset


\item \texttt{file\_type::Int}: file type


\item \texttt{datetime\_last\_saved::DateTime}: dataset last saved date and time


\item \texttt{program::String}: program which created uff file


\item \texttt{datetime\_written::DateTime}: uff file written date and time

\end{itemize}
